message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $20,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you, and this is a competitive price for the value it provides.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $10,000 for it. Could we possibly come to an agreement closer to that amount?
Bob, I understand your position, but $20,000 is closer to my bottom line.  How about we meet in the middle at $15,000?
Hello Alice, thank you for considering my request. I'm still not able to go above $10,000 for this product. Would it be possible to reach a compromise at $12,000?
